summary: Brooke, a plain but creative and hard-working student at the top fashion school in the nation, who has come a long way from her tough childhood spent going from one foster home to another ... See full summary »
cast: Kaley Cuoco|Dominic Chianese|Megan Fox|Pat Kelly|Chuck Shamata|Jill Morrison|Serena Lee|Anthony Sherwood|Clive Walton|Graham Harley|Tim Rozon|Shannon Duff|Joyce Gordon|Darryl Hinds|David Sparrow|Louis Di Bianco|Cheryl MacInnis|Robert Lee|Michelle McCree|Angelo Celeste|Raymond Miller|George Ploszczansky|Hazel Gorin|James Kall|Michael Sercerchi|Catherine Emmanuel
title: Crimes of Fashion
